mapper.select: select role.roleId,role.name,employeerole.createTime,employeerole.updateTime from employeerole,role where employeeId = #{employeeId} and employeerole.roleId = role.roleId

select employee.employeeId,employee.username,employee.name,employee.phone,employee.email,employee.position,employee.sex,employee.entryTime,department.departmentId,department.name as dname from employee,department where employee.departmentname=department.name

select employee.employeeId,employee.username,employee.name,employee.phone,employee.email,employee.position,employee.sex,department.departmentId,department.name as dname from employee,department where employee.departmentname=department.name LIMIT ${(currentPageNum-1)*pageSize}, ${pageSize}
select * from role where employeeId = #{employeeId} and roleId = #{roleId}
select * from employee where employeeId in (select employeeId from employeerole where roleid = #{roleId})
select name from role where roleId in(select roleId from RoleMenu where menuId = (select menuId from menu where url = #{urlPattern}))
select code from menu where menuId in (select menuId from RoleMenu where roleId in (select roleId from EmployeeRole where employeeId = #{employeeId}))
